name: 2 SUS 1 MATE
description:
2 SUS 1 MATE is a (in construction) 3D FPS Horror game Among-us / Slender / Fnaf inspirated.

You spawn on the Skeld at night, you have a flashlight (limited battery power) and you have to collect the 8 pages to win. Ofc there are 2 Sus looking for you around the map, if one of them saw you : RUN

This game is still in construction. (option menu is not available...)

Ressources : 

Map model : https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/among-us-map-the-skeld-59a93886f9e74ff6836dff0c2...

Characters model : https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/among-us-character-1167417509bd43e0bdfa7e562c201...
